articles.title: Dodgers news: Julio Urías, Justin Turner, Bradley Zimmer - True Blue LA
articles.description: Julio Urías leads the majors in home runs allowed with several mistakes. Plus Justin Turner talks about his free agency and surprisingly not returning to the Dodgers. Plus a few other old friend alerts.

articles.title: The Golden Knights Forecheck Went After Dallas In Game 1 And They're Coming Again In Game 2 - SinBin.vegas
articles.description: From the very first shift of the game the Golden Knights consistently sent puck after puck after puck deep into the Dallas zone and then hounded their defensemen until they'd unwillingly give it back.

(Photo Credit: Ken Boehlke, SinBin.vegas)
In Game 1, the game plan for the Golden Knights was simple, literally the age old hockey cliche.
Get it in deep.
